annotation.documentation: PatternSet from "A feedback model of perceptual learning and categorisation", Visual Cognition 13(2):129-65,2006.
This patternSet contains a representation for the bars of the novel stimulus of fig. 5.

Horizontal bars occupy bits 0-5, starting at top left, first running left-right, then top to bottom. Vertical bars occupy bits 6-11, starting at top left, running from left to right, then top to bottom. Left-right downward diagonals occupy bits 12-15, same numbering as above. Left-right upward diagonals occupy bits 16-19, same numbering as above.
